## cartesian variable

Converts polar vector `v` to cartesian coordinates and adds optional `offset`<!-- -->. See `polar()` for reverse operation. If `out` is null, modifies `v` in place.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
cartesian: MultiVecOpVO<ReadonlyVec>
```
